TopicTitle: How do you write the thing underneath your reply/post?

Articles.Content:
Mine was going to be-

Bobsled design-An airplane with no landing gear but resting on two SRB and sliding is the easiest takeoff ever(it is called LANDING gear, not taking-off gear)

Or something along the lines of that.

The signature? You need a minimum number of posts before you can add one (can't remember exact number, either 5 or 10). After that, click "Settings" in the top right, scroll down a little, and under "My Settings" click "Edit Signature"
